review: I absolutely cannot say enough grand things about Amazon Fire TV. It is everything we wanted and a lot more!  We have had two other streaming devices and this by far is the best we have had. The quickness and the voice search are amazing!  We have had an Apple TV when the second generation came out and we have had a Tivo and neither of them performed like this Amazon Fire TV. We are very happy with it and it suits our family. It is lightening fast and I am happy to see there are tutorials on YouTube that show in detail how much more it can do. For us it is perfect.
